TEXT.Text: Union of Spirit
Get me the Wave Stabilizer!
Don't be late!
1 minute left. Before it gets too late, we need to equip the Wave Stabilizer onto the Dimensional Stabilizer.
What are you doing? The dimension has been collapsed!
10 seconds left. 9…8…7…
Repair Dimensional Stabilizer
Find Wave Stabilizer
The Dimensional Stabilizer is breaking apart.
Is that the Wave Stabilizer? Please give it to me now.

Since the Dimensional Stabilizer still stands, the dimensional collapse hasn't happened.... yet.%% But we don't know how long it can last. The Wave Stabilizer must be found quickly.%% The Wave Stabilizer was stolen by the Jojo Bros in [Metro City Pier].
Two dimensions will collapse if we don't move quickly!
Dimensional Stabilizer will soon reach its limits.
Defeat Jonathan
Defeat Joseph
Wave Stabilizer
Welcome to Metro City.
You? Did you pass through the Sinkhole?

Can you help me please?%% This is a {C=0xFFFF0000/}Portable Dimensional Stabilizer{C=0xFF4D0D08/}. If you equip this, you will find it easier to move around in this world in stability.%% Also, {C=0xFFFF0000/}without a Metro City Entrance Ticket{C=0xFF4D0D08/} you won't be able to enter, so please take this.

You are from a world called Dragonica? Hmm... interesting. I'm Dr. Nicola and this is Metro City. %% I've been conducting my studies regarding dimension shifting.%% The machine next to me makes passage between dimensions possible.%% For some reasons, right after opening the dimensional passage, the Jojo Bros Gang from Metro City stole the Wave Stabilizer which is a vital component.%% Without this component, the dimensional passage cannot be closed.%% I would hypothesise that the passage has been open for too long and a dimensional distortion occurred, opening a portal in Dragonica as well.%%
Please move away if you have nothing to talk about. This world might disappear.
What are you curious about?
Talk to Nicola
Jojo's Peculiar Jailbreak
The Jojo Bros have escaped from Alkam Prison.
How would the Jojo Bros escape from Alkam Prison?
Alkam Prison is famous for strict security but the Jojo Bros escaped from it and came to [Metro City Port].%% I can't get any sleep because I'm worried about them coming to attack my laboratory.
The Jojo Bros might not just stop at stealing components, they might destroy the laboratory.
What's the sound outside? Is it... the Jojo Bros?
Defeat Jonathan
Defeat Joseph
A war against crime and violence
The Jojo Bros and their minions are trouble.
Thanks to %name% the power of Metro City gangs has been weakened. Thank you.
Although the Jojo Bros were captured, their gang are still out there.%% We don't have the manpower to stop them due to lack of police officers in Metro City.%% I hope %name% can help us out.
If it stays this way, this laboratory will also be taken over by them.
Are you looking for the entrance to [Metro City Port]?
Defeat Gang members
How do I close this Sinkhole?
(beep..beep….) Start Sinkhole extinction protocol. (beep…) Check energy capacity. Error occurred.
Energy charge completed. Operate Sinkhole extinction protocol.
Energy capacity is insufficient to maintain protocol. Please recharge energy.%% Lack of energy.%% Protocol ceased. Switch to maintenance mode.
Stop operation when energy is all used. Sinkhole maintenance system is down.%% Expected situation. Danger of dimensional collapse due to Sinkhole functionality.
Current energy capacity 3%. Possible to continue maintain mode for 30 minutes. Starting count down.
Titanium Ore
Where is the next destination?
Hmm. This Sinkhole....is there a way to get rid of it?
(crack..scratchy…) Error, Error. Danger, stopping operation.

The Sinkhole is getting bigger.%% We don't know when it'll stop but there's rumor that it could swallow up Port of the Winds completely.%% There's no other way but to enter into Sinkhole and investigate.%% %name%, will you accept this mission?
It's a matter of the very future Port of the Winds. We need a hero!
A pedestrian was sucked into the Sinkhole. It's getting more serious.
Passing through Sinkhole
What hole? Sinkhole?
Villagers are feeling nervous nowdays.
A big dimensional hole? Well. This can't be good, can it?

A few days ago this {C=0xFF00863C/}Sinkhole appeared {C=0xFF4D0D08/}next to Advanced Archer [Rony]. %% We couldn't start our investigation because we don't have any information.%% We have kept the villagers away but they are starting to worry about it.%% %name% can you investigate the hole for us?
Villagers are worried about it. Chaotic rumors are running rampant.
Please hurry up.
(…I feel like I'm being sucked into the hole. It seems like a passage to somewhere.)
Investigate Sinkhole
Nicola's Laboratory
